page.title: 13A Picture of Breedon/Tonge
page.content: We did da small census of Breedon and Tonge. We sent out 400 survey letters and had a 47 percent return. From that imformation we have been able to protray a social picture of the village. It appears that the majority of people in the villages are of the age 50 and over and most of the houses have two occupants. This would suggest a large proportion of retired people live in the villages. Most of the houses have 6 rooms:- 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 living room and kitchen. Most people own 1 car with a garage. The cars are used mostly for pleasure and business, because the majority of people work outside Breedon and Tonge. However, just over 50 percent of the people use {Continues on page 14
